meanings.sent1: The loud noise wakened the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent2: I wakened early to catch the sunrise.
meanings.sent3: The alarm clock wakened me with its annoying sound.
meanings.sent4: The smell of fresh coffee wakened my senses.
meanings.sent5: The chirping birds wakened the entire neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: She wakened from her deep slumber feeling refreshed.
meanings.sent2: As the sun rose, the city wakened to a new day.
meanings.sent3: The loud applause wakened the tired audience.
meanings.sent4: The shocking news wakened him to the reality of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of baking bread wakened memories of childhood.
